mods.abstract: Male adult, Navajo man, brown cloth head and all body, painted features, black hair wig, white head-band, white yarn tied at the back of the hair, brown cloth boots, blue velvet blouse with lining, bead buttons, belt with bead decorations, white pants have side slit on each leg, beads earrings and necklace. Accompanying information describes that Navajo men wear loose flapping trousers and velveteen blouses. Their wide belts are decorated with silver and often with turquoise. Doll body is hand and machine-made. Costume is machine-made.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
